name: Precision Break
description:
[Story]

Tae comes home from work to find out that his sister has been kidnapped, and the only way to save her is to defeat 6 Assassins known as the twisted six.
Are you up to the task?

[Features]

- Full Original Soundtrack
- 2 Playable Character
- 2 Stories, 2 Perspectives
- Full Story Dialogue
- Full Replayability
- 3 Levels of Difficulty

[Gameplay]

- 2D side-scrolling action
- Action Packed Bosses
- Buy Upgrades
- Gun Action
- Sword Action
- 2 Characters, 2 Play Styles
